title: Cloud Platform / Site Reliability Engineer
description:
Supabase is an Open Source and fully remote company building developer tools for databases. We are seeking a Cloud Platform Engineer / SRE to manage the infrastructure of our Postgres databases. We currently manage over 1M Postgres instances and are growing fast.

You will

  • Help build the Supabase Cloud offering.
  • Improve our system architecture to reduce costs while balancing security and performance.
  • Work on designing and tracking metrics for platform uptime.
  • Increase observability into our system by capturing relevant metrics and logs.
  • Implement and maintain intrusion detection, automated remediation and patch management systems.
  • Design CI/CD systems to speed up deployments with proper change and release management processes.

You are

  • Experience in designing multi-tenant database solutions, designing for failover, fault-tolerance, and disaster recovery;
  • 5+ years experience in SRE/DevOps/Cloud Infrastructure;
  • 4+ years of experience in building with Golang and Typescript;
  • Experience in managing large deployments on AWS;
  • Knowledge of networking;
  • Experience with Infrastructure as Code tools;

Onboarding logistics

Successful candidates will be required to participate in an in-person onboarding program in Singapore. This onboarding process will last for 1-2 weeks. During this time, new hires will be immersed in our culture, systems, and processes, ensuring they are well-prepared to excel in their responsibilities.

We offer

  • 100% remote work from anywhere in the world. No location-based adjustment to your salary.
  • ESOP (equity ownership in the company)
  • Autonomous work. We work collaboratively on projects, but you set your own pace.
  • Health, Vision and Dental benefits. Supabase covers 100% of the cost for employees and 80% for dependents
  • Tech Allowance for any office setup you need
  • Annual Education Allowance
  • Annually run off-sites.

 

BUILD IN A WEEKEND. SCALE TO BILLIONS

Supabase adds auth, realtime, and restful APIs to Postgres without a single line of code.

Each project within Supabase is an isolated Postgres cluster, allowing customers to scale independently, while still providing the features that you need to build: instant database setup, auth, row level security, realtime data streams, auto-generating APIs, and a simple to use web interface.

We are a fully remote company.

Key Tech: Javascript, Typescript, Go, Elixir, PostgREST (haskell), Postgres, Pulumi.

About the team

  • We're a startup. It's unstructured.
  • Collectively founded more than a dozen venture-backed companies.
  • More than 10 different nationalities.
  • We deeply believe in the efficacy of collaborative open source. We support existing communities and tools, rather than building "yet another xx".
  • We "dogfood" everything. If you use it in your project, we use it in Supabase.

Process

  • The entire process is fully remote and all communication will happen over email or via video chat.
  • Once you've submitted your application, the team will review your submission, and may reach out for a short screening interview over video call.
  • If you pass the screen you will be invited to up to four follow up interviews. The calls:
    • usually take between 20-45 minutes each depending on the interviewer.
    • are all 1:1.
    • will be with both founders, a member of either the growth or engineering team (depending on the role), and usually one other person from your immediate team or function.
  • Once the interviews are over, the team will meet to discuss several roles and candidates and may:
    • ask one or two follow-up questions over email or a quick call.
    • go directly to making an offer.

title: Depo Müdürü
description:
Bir teknolojisi firması olarak faaliyet gösterdiğimiz tüm pazarlarda lider olmak vizyonuyla çıktığımız yolda bize katılmak ister misiniz?

Kurumsalın alışılagelmiş ifadelerinden ve hiyerarşiden uzak heyecan verici bir kariyere başlamak için en iyi yönlerini ortaya çıkarmaya hazır, dinamik, entelektüel açıdan meraklı genç profesyoneller arıyoruz. Hızla büyümeye devam eden bir teknoloji şirketi olarak gerçek hayatta yaşanan sorunları çözme ve profesyonel yaşamı deneyimleme imkanı sunuyoruz. Yaptığın işin tüm sorumluluğunu almak istiyorsan, işine katkı sağlayacak yeni fikirlerin olduğunda sesini duyurmak istiyorsan ve olağanüstü bir işbaşında eğitim deneyimi yaşamaya hazırsan; o zaman meydan okumaya hazırsın. Bu heyecana ortak olup başarımızı daha da ileriye taşıyacak Depo Müdürü arıyoruz.

🎯 Sorumluluklar

  • Kendisine bağlı depo organizasyonunun azami müşteri memnuniyetini sağlayacak şekilde çalışmasını sağlamak, bu amaca hizmet edecek şekilde ekibi organize etmek, yönlendirmek, eğitmek
  • Kesme çiçek üreticilerinden gelen ürünlerin kalite standartlarına göre teslim alınması, depolanması ve muhafaza edilmesi
  • Kesme çiçeklere ait envanterleri doğru ve düzenli bir şekilde tutarak deponun düzenli ve temiz kalmasının sağlanması
  • Anahtar performans göstergelerini takip etmek ve hedeflere uygun şekilde gerçekleştirilmesi için gerekli önlemleri almak (zamanında eksiksiz karşılama oranı, kayıp oranı, yardımcı malzemeler envanter seviyesi, lojistik  maliyetlerinin ciroya oranı, fazla mesai oranı vb.)
  • Lojistik tedarikçilerini yönetmek ve araç organizasyonunu sağlamak
  • Bayi siparişlerinin eksiksiz ve zamanında karşılanması için gerekli haftalık planlamaları yapmak, haftalık çalışma düzenini oluşturmak
  • Stok doğruluğunu ve WMS sisteminin sorunsuz işleyişini sağlamak, WMS sistemini yönetmek, personele gerekli sistemsel eğitimleri vermek, barkod sisteminin sağlıklı bir şekilde yürütülmesini sağlamak
  • Depo ve dağıtım süreçlerindeki dar boğazları tespit etmek, çözüm için fikirler üretmek
  • Deponun yapısı ve ürünlerin özelliklerine uygun şekilde depo yerleşim planını optimize etmek
  • Deponun fiziki düzeni sağlamak, her zaman sayıma/denetime hazır halde, temiz ve düzenli olmasını sağlamak, ürünlerin kalite standartlarına uygun koşullarda muhafazasını temin etmek
  • Merkez tedarik zinciri birimine raporlama ve analizleri düzenli olarak yapmak
  • ISG ve kalite ile ilgili tüm önlemlerin 100% uygulanmasını sağlamak
    • ,

    ✨Aranan Nitelikler

  • Üniversite mezunu (tercihen Gıda / Ziraat Mühendisliği bölümlerinden mezun)
  • Gıda üretim işletmelerinde, soğuk zincir alanında en az 5 yıl tecrübeli
  • Depo yönetimi, stok ve sipariş planlama, soğuk zincir dağıtımı konularında deneyimli
  • İş süreçlerini sistemsel olarak analiz edebilecek ve gelişimine katkıda bulunacak
  • Takım çalışmasına yatkın, organizasyon ve iletişim becerileri güçlü
  • Karar verme ve problem çözme becerileri gelişmiş, ekip yönetme yetkinliği olan sonuç odaklı
  • Etkin raporlama yapabilen
  • MS Office programlarına hakim
  • Tercihen İngilizce bilen
  • Erkek adaylar için askerlik hizmetini tamamlamış
  • Kartal / Pendik lokasyonuna ulaşım sağlayabilecek

title: HR Technical Recruiter (remote-only opportunity, Europe & CIS)
description:
Cloudlinux we are leader in providing IT solutions for web hosting. Here, you get an opportunity to work with unique technologies and solve complicated tasks in teams of what might just be the best specialists in the industry. Thanks to remote work, you will be able to live the way you like. You will open new horizons for professional and personal development and realize your bold ideas. 

We are looking to hire a Tech Recruiter to identify, recruit, screen, and present good candidates for tech and other department positions, collaborating with hiring managers to set realistic technical requirements.

You can find more details about the project and the company on our branded websites at Cloudlinux.com and TuxCare.com.

Join us to make a difference!

What you will do:

  • Collaborate and strategize with hiring managers to understand their needs and roles to be filled; review job descriptions for vacancies
  • Create ideal candidate profiles for your open requisitions
  • Identify appropriate candidates and assess their qualifications through Talent Density interviewing practice
  • Communicate your rationale for hiring your ideal candidates to the hiring manager
  • Manage the interview process with the hiring manager and their team
  • Maintain open communication with candidates to keep them informed about the status of their applications
  • Assist in the onboarding process for new hires
  • Assist the HR team with other HR-related matters

Requirements:

To be successful in this role you should:

  • Have 2 to 5 years of experience as a technical recruiter; developers, DevOps, release engineers
  • You believe recruiting is an extension of sales and marketing; we sell the company to our candidates
  • Treat each applicant with respect 
  • Have excellent interpersonal skills
  • Strategic in your recruitment process; building networks is key to sustainable success
  • You have a passion for learning new avenues for finding the best candidates
  • You have excellent verbal and written communication skills
  • You enjoy learning about people, their career paths, and goals
  • You should have a strong understanding of technology, technical roles and technical skills
  • You have an in-depth understanding of recruiting methods and best practices
  • Proficient in both Russian (native or bilingual) and English languages (B2 or higher).

Benefits:

What's in it for you?

  • A focus on professional development;
  • Interesting and challenging projects
  • Flexible working hours
  • Paid one month vacation per year and unlimited sick leave
  • Medical insurance reimbursement
  • Co-working and gym/sports reimbursement
  • The opportunity to receive a reward for the most innovative idea that the company can patent

By applying for this position, you agree with Cloudlinux Privacy Policy and give us your consent to maintain and process your personal data with this respect. Please read our Privacy Policy for more information.

title: Design Manager
description:
At Atlan, we are on an important mission to help data teams to do their lives’ best work. We believe that when data teams become more productive and agile, they will go on to do amazing things - from helping humankind get to Mars to maybe, finding the cure for cancer someday. Every Atlanian is committed to giving the best customer and user experience possible to the humans of data.
 
As a Design Manager, you'll be responsible for building and scaling a high-performing design team, shaping Atlan's design vision, and ensuring our products are intuitive, delightful, and user-centric.



Your Mission at Atlan 🎯
  • Lead and mentor a talented team of designers, fostering a culture of creativity, collaboration, and professional growth.
  • Partner with product managers and engineers to define product vision, translate user needs into design solutions, and drive product roadmaps.
  • Understand the domain, users and technology of the product area(s) which you work on deeply, and proactively understand the broader product.
  • Listen in on customer calls and collaborate with the UX Research team to conduct user interviews with our to identify areas of improvement in the product and strategy and mentor other designers on how they conduct and communicate their research.
  • Collaborate with the Product Management team and work on identifying, defining and solving complex user experience issues in the pods you’re responsible for.
  • Participate in recruiting - conducting portfolio reviews, whiteboard challenges, and contributing towards hiring related assets and establishing the brand of Atlan’s design team in the community.
  • Own and mature the design process end to to end - from concepts, user flows and wireframes to visuals, and shipping of the feature and impact validation - and ship deliverables that raise the bar of craft and quality of Atlan’s user experience
  • Participate in our design critique sessions and mentor other designers and help them benefit from your expertise and experience
  • Spot process inefficiencies and take initiatives to improve Atlan's overall product development process.
  • Help improve and evangelize the design culture within Atlan!



What Makes You a Match for us 😍
  • You enjoy learning continuously and can absorb complex domain related concepts quickly and effectively. Databases, querying, lineage etc will soon become the jargon you'll have to speak and understand. You'll stand out if you have a background in Computer Science or a fair understanding of the data ecosystem
  • You bring years of experience designing & shipping consumer grade enterprise products or complex web applications that are loved by end users and customers alike. Experience working in the data domain will be an added bonus.
  • You’ve got a portfolio of work that shows us your product design & strategy skills from concept to visual design execution
  • You have managed and scaled design teams before, and love taking initiative to mature existing processes, culture and team rituals to build a world class design team.
  • You have strong critical thinking skills - i.e. you demonstrate the ability to deconstruct a complex, ambiguous problem into its base components and figure out the most effective way to solve it
  • You can communicate effectively and work autonomously - it will be much needed in a remote setup!
  • You do not wait for instructions and guidelines but believe in taking end-to-end ownership of things - to do the right thing for our end users.



What the Role Offers  💌
  • An environment where you’re surrounded by talented, driven, and yet humble folks, focused on creating the best experience for data teams around the world
  • Freedom to work remotely from anywhere in the world
  • Complete ownership of the end-user experience of Atlan and impact in a product that is focussed on becoming the home for data teams, just how Figma became the home for design teams and Github became the home for engineering teams
  • Company of people that value our culture very highly - you’ll be inundated with books, learning recommendations, knowledge-sharing sessions, and pictures of pets in their dedicated Slack channels! 🐕🐈
  • Why Atlan, Our Hiring Process
